DOC.brief_summary: This phase 2 , randomize , multi-center , double-blind , 3-period 3-treatment crossover study design evaluate safety duration efficacy SPD465 ( 50 75 mg ) compare placebo immediate release amphetamine salt formulation ( 25 mg ) adult ADHD . The controlled environment use study analog classroom set adapt 16-hour adult day .
